name: Bean on an Adventure.
description:
Bean on an Adventure is a hidden objects game. Follow Bean on his journey through various locations and help him to find objects along the way.

Any constructive feedback would be welcome.

This demo version comes with the first two levels.

The acheivements "Crazy" and "Insanity" are not available in the Demo version.

Key Features:

          Things that are hidden.

          Finding things that are hidden.

Windows Keyboard Controls:

          WASD or Arrow Keys to move around the picture.

          + and - to zoom in and out.

          C to move to the center of the picture.

Windows Mouse Controls:

          Hold Right Mouse Button to move around the picture.

          Mouse Scroll Wheel to zoom in and out.

          Press the Mouse Scroll Wheel to move to the center of the picture.

          Left Click on an item when you have found it.

          Left Click on an item in the Hidden Item List for a hint.

Android Touch Controls:
          Use one finger and drag to move around the picture.
          Use two fingers and pinch to zoom in an out.
          Double Tap quickly to move to the center of the picture.
          Tap on an Object when you have found it.
          Tap on an Object in the Hidden Object List for a hint.
